body_html:
Thanks! Are you in a position to send a PR it two to fix?

Just made
#15617
About 2 item - that my mistake, did not read documentation precisely enough. It says "The specified sizes of the non-adjustable dimensions must by at least as large as in the values tensor", so my test example is not correct since it violates this requirement. I've added check in my PR for that case, since getting python exception is better then get unpredictable results in runtime.

body:
> Thanks! Are you in a position to send a PR it two to fix?

Just made
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/15617
About 2 item - that my mistake, did not read documentation precisely enough. It says "The specified sizes of the non-adjustable dimensions must by at least as large as in the values tensor", so my test example is not correct since it violates this requirement. I've added check in my PR for that case, since getting python exception is better then get unpredictable results in runtime.
